#summary Funnel I/O module v1.0
#labels Featured,Phase-Design

= Introduction =

Funnel I/O module v1.0 (FIO) is an Arduino clone with XBee in a small form factor.

http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3024/2575627150_20679ebc84_m.jpg

  * http://www.flickr.com/photos/25323104@N00/2575627150/
  * http://www.flickr.com/photos/25323104@N00/2574801125/
  * http://www.flickr.com/photos/25323104@N00/2575626476/
  * http://www.flickr.com/photos/25323104@N00/2552929341/
  * http://www.flickr.com/photos/25323104@N00/2552929287/

= Key features =

  * An Arduino clone with a XBee module (802.15.4 or ZNet 2.5)
  * Almost same size as a FRISK box (but much thicker...)
  * ATMEGA168V @ 8MHz (a ceramic resonator is optional)
  * On-board DC/DC converter (austriamicrosystems' AS1322)
  * The schematic was derived from LilyPad Arduino v1.6

If you have any comments and/or suggestions, please feel free to leave here as comments, or send an e-mail to me (kotobuki[at]yapan.org).
